pages.name: Winged Monkey
pages.text: Entities must be inside the central $(item)Cobweb$().

pages.title: Mutation Details
pages.text: Entities:$(br)$(8)>$() 1 Wolf$(br)$(8)>$() 1 $(l:creatures/owl)Owl$(/l)$(p)Notes:$(br)One $(l:herbology/herbology#grassper)Grassper$(/l) needs to hold a $(l:)Charged Attuned Stone$(/l), one a $(item)Poppy$() and the other two $(l:)Mutandis Extremis$(/l)$(p)Cocoa must be fully mature.
